name: MLG Pong
description: Ever wanted to play Pong like a real pro? Well m9, MLG Pong is just the right game for you! You must play as Mountain Dew to reck Doritos and become the supreme MLG snack food. Beware, the ball speeds up to super Sanic speeds, so you have to be a true pro to keep up. After five minutes, the MLG gods will get a 25 kill streak and end the game with a nuke. Whoever has the highest score when the nuke goes off, wins the game and becomes a true MLG!
